item.description:
The Province of New Brunswick’s Population Growth Division cordially invites you to a Boston-area Canadian Expat Social: Tuesday, October 16, 6 p.m.-8 p.m., Marriott Courtyard - Copley Square, 88 Exeter Street.
Come and join us for a taste of New Brunswick hospitality and your chance to learn more about lifestyle and career opportunities waiting for you New Brunswick! Bring your business card for a chance to win 1 of 2 iPod Shuffles, Tim Horton’s coffee and other great New Brunswick treats.

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Enjoy an Evening of New Brunswick Hospitality
